metadata.name: Charm The Sugarbowl
metadata.description: Take a behind the scenes look inside Steven Cerio's creation of Sunbeam on the Astronaut and Magnificent Pigtail Shadow. A collection of sketches, sculpture painting and collage in full color from 2012-2014. Steven Cerio has spent over two decades relentlessly documenting a universe devoid of death and decay. His work is best known for his ongoing collaboration with San Francisco-based, performance art group, The Residents.
